channel.title: Help with latescape
channel.description: i need help on how to make people pmods and how to give myself lvl3 admin or w/e i need to know how to do that some1 help me plz

item.title: Help with latescape
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Ok I have never heard of latescape, but apparently it could be either p16 or Testscape (cheezscape) based. (world 8 based is rare). Ok there are 2 ways to make pmods/ admins/ owners. Here they are:

---------------------------------------------------------------Project 16 based---------------------------------------------------------------------

Ok go into your file callled characters and click on 1 of them. It will show this:

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = _
character-password = blank

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3242
character-posy = 3430
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20060920
character-energy = 0
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 1

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 -1 0
character-equip = 4 -1 0
character-equip = 5 -1 0
character-equip = 6 0 0
character-equip = 7 -1 0
character-equip = 8 0 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0
character-equip = 11 0 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 1 0
character-skill = 1 1 0
character-skill = 2 1 0
character-skill = 3 10 1155
character-skill = 4 1 0
character-skill = 5 1 0
character-skill = 6 1 0
character-skill = 7 1 0
character-skill = 8 1 0
character-skill = 9 1 0
character-skill = 10 1 0
character-skill = 11 1 0
character-skill = 12 1 0
character-skill = 13 1 0
character-skill = 14 1 0
character-skill = 15 1 0
character-skill = 16 1 0
character-skill = 17 1 0
character-skill = 18 1 0
character-skill = 19 1 0
character-skill = 20 1 0
character-skill = 21 1 0
character-skill = 22 1 0
character-skill = 23 1 0
character-skill = 24 1 0

[ITEMS]

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]

[/code]

Ok now you can change this:

character-rights = 0

0 = Regular player

1 = Player moderator

2 = Aministrator (gold moderator)

3 = Owner (sometimes considerd admin)

Now save and log onto the file. DO NOT DO THIS EDIT WHILE INSIDE THE CHAR. LOG OUT OF THE CHAR AND THEN EDIT. THEN SAVE AND LOG BACK ON AND SETTINGS WILL APPLY.

*If this did not work then try the one below:

---------------------------------------------------------------Testscape Based---------------------------------------------------------------------

Ok go into client.java and search for this:

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin"))

You will see this:

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { playerRights = 3; }

Now if your making a player mod then do this:

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PMODS NAME")) { playerRights = 1; }

Here is admin/gmod:

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("GMODS NAME")) { playerRights = 2; }

Here is owner code:

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME")) { playerRights = 3; }

Ok where i put the PMODS NAME/ GMODS NAME/ YOURNAME, then actually put that information in that place. Dont put the playerâ€™s name that your upping in caps and dont use underscores (just normal spaces).

Ok what I provided you with hopefully helped. Enjoy!

[hidefromsilab]I eat rep++ for breakfest!!![/hidefromsilab]

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic
